content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for help with HVAC, plumbing, or electrical work?
Hi! I need someone to look at my AC. It's not blowing cold air.
I can help you with that! May I please have your full name for the appointment?
Thank you, Megan! May I get the address where you'd like our technician to come check your AC?
It's 731 Pebble Ridge Lane, Sycamore, OH 44882.
Great, thanks! When would you like the technician to come by? Let me know your ideal date and time.
Oh, I just realized I don't have my calendar with me right now. Can I get back to you later when I know my schedule?
reason: Customer did not have calendar handy and indicated they would reach out later.
